XI.ii.3.E.5.f
.
Retroactive Increases for Accrued Lump Sum
Accrued lump sum
is
payable only for periods covered by an award (active or suspended) in effect at the date of the Veteran’s death.
Note
:  Do not increase or create an accrued lump sum benefit by reason of an accrued rating or posthumous authorization decision relative to rates payable to the Veteran over a retroactive period.  The amount payable is only the amount withheld as determined by awards in the claims folder.
Reference
:  For more information on the evidence in the claims folder, see
M21-1, Part XI, Subpart ii, 3.A.4
.
